General.Name: Japan Post Insurance Co Ltd
General.Description: Japan Post Insurance Co., Ltd. provides life insurance products and services in Japan. It also offers agency services for other insurance companies, including foreign insurance and financial services companies, as well as loan guarantees. In addition, the company is involved in trading of government bonds and government-guaranteed bonds, corporate bonds, and other bonds; and management of postal life insurance policies. It offers its products through directly managed sales offices to individual and corporate customers. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
General.Address: Otemachi Place West Tower 3-1, Tokyo, Japan, 100-8794
